thread.title: Great location in London
thread.title_full: Great location in London - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: klin18
title: Great location in London
text:
Booked this hotel through an offer on Travelzoo and we were extremely pleased.
Excellent location and really close to Gloucester Road tube station which made getting around very easy. Also walking distance to Kensington Palace which was a bonus as we were visiting the Lady Di clothes exhibition. We upgraded to an Executive King room but not sure that we had a sitting area as advertised but apart from sleeping we didn't spend much time there. Large comfortable bed, plenty of hot water and although we looked out to the main road it was very quiet, we were on the 3rd floor. Breakfast was fantastic and cooked to order much better than the buffet type kept warm under lights. Also I have to say how good and friendly all the staff were throughout the hotel. Highly recommended especially on a deal.
